Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Web Shooter^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

If you thought large spiders were a threat, try taking out a ^orange;Megarachnid^reset;...they're the largest spiders in the galaxy. I dare you, in fact! Kill a ^orange;Megarachnid^reset; and you'll get my respect.
